title: Hired five assistant professors, four are females
content: please add photos, research areas and their PhD institutions

title: Lead a project representing TTU as one of five organizations (among GE, Purdue university, etc.) that won DOE Funding through Cybersecurity Manufacturing Innovation Institute (Sep 27, 2021)
content: Rattikorn Hewett lead a project representing TTU as one of five organizations (among GE, Purdue university, etc.) that won DOE Funding through Cybersecurity Manufacturing Innovation Institute (Sep 27, 2021). The project titled "Energy baselining, Optimization and Security Augmentation of Oil Refinery" includes multidisciplinary engineering co-Is (V.Shankar, T. Dang) and industrial partner with Dylek (E. Bediago).

title: Supadchaya Puangpontip, a PhD student won a grant support from CRA (Computing Research Association) to participate in 2022 CRA-WP Grad Cohort for Women
content: Supadchaya Puangpontip, a PhD student won a grant support from CRA (Computing Research Association) to participate in 2022 CRA-WP Grad Cohort for Women

title: Enrollment growth and the number of students keep rising
content: Enrollment growth and the number of students keep rising both UG and Grad program (get % increase from last year and current data from Jeremy)

title: Hosted 8 Brazillian students for REU
content: As part of the college International program and recruitment, hosted 8 Brazillian students for REU during Fall (get details from George Spoth)

title: Faranak Abri, a PhD student won a grant support from CRA
content: Faranak Abri, a PhD student won a grant support from CRA (Computing Research Association) to participate in 2022 CRA-WP Grad Cohort for Women

title: Received grant from Office of Navy Research on Automatically Measuring Phishing Victim Susceptibility
content: Received grant from Office of Navy Research on Automatically Measuring Phishing Victim Susceptibility from Publicly Available Information, 2021. The amount of award is $784,732.

title: Two student teams from Texas Tech University are participating in the 2022 Winter Classic Student Cluster Competition in Spring 2022 and competing against the rest ten teams from Historically Black and Hispanic universities. Read more about this ongoing story from the media coverage of HPCwire (https://www.hpcwire.com/tag/winter-classic/).
